description: All the data that is presented here is captured by the PromEx BEAM plugin (https://github.com/akoutmos/prom_ex/blob/master/lib/prom_ex/plugins/beam.ex)

panels.description: The amount of time that has passed since the system has started.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Shows the various options that OTP was compiled with.
panels.title: OTP Compiler Options

panels.description: The OTP major version running the application.
panels.title: OTP Major Version

panels.description: The number of running BEAM processes currently running.
panels.title: Process Count

panels.description: Shows information regarding the schedulers configured for the BEAM instance.
panels.title: System Information

panels.description: The number of currently active ports.
panels.title: Port Count

panels.description: The number of currently allocated ETS tables.
panels.title: ETS Table Count

panels.description: Shows information regarding the system limits of the BEAM instance.
panels.title: System Limits

panels.description: The amount of memory currently allocated by the BEAM.
panels.title: Total Memory Usage

panels.description: The number of atoms currently in the atom table.
panels.title: Atom Count

panels.description: Stats on the current memory usage.
panels.title: Allocated Memory

panels.description: The number of garbage collection events that are occurring and the number of bytes reclaimed
panels.title: Garbage Collection

panels.description: Statistics regarding the normal scheduler.
panels.title: Normal Scheduler Status

panels.description: Statistics regarding the dirty schedulers.
panels.title: Dirty Scheduler Status

panels.description: The number of context switches that have occured along with the number of reductions.
panels.title: VM Load

panels.description: The number of running BEAM processes.
panels.title: Active BEAM Processes

panels.description: The number of atoms currently in the atom table
panels.title: Atom Table Size

panels.description: The number of bytes sent and received through ports.
panels.title: Port IO

panels.description: The number of active ETS tables.
panels.title: ETS Tables

panels.description: The number of active ports.
panels.title: Active Ports

title: Controller - Virtual Machine
